about_the_game:
This content includes the deck recipe and the cards of D-TD02.

[INCLUDED CARDS]
4 copies of each card will be available.
・D-TD02/001EN Jewel-embracing Dragon Fang, Drajeweled
・D-TD02/002EN Demonic Stone Dragon, Jewelneel
・D-TD02/003EN Jewel Core Dragon
・D-TD02/004EN Jewelias Dracokid
・D-TD02/005EN Truculence Raider
・D-TD02/007EN Mystic Accordionist
・D-TD02/008EN Avid Heaper
・D-TD02/009EN Direful Doll, Kjerstin
・D-TD02/010EN One Who Calls Upon Raging Thunder, Furgres
・D-TD02/012EN Connected Rampage, Clenn
・D-TD02/013EN Insane Researcher
・D-TD02/014EN Wire-pull Subjugater
・D-TD02/015EN Caper Companion
・D-TD02/016EN Ultrasound Sirie
・D-TD02/017EN Friend of the Netherworld, Ling
・D-SD02/006EN Icicle Ein, Aizer
・D-SD02/009EN Psychic Prima, Miranda

1 copy of each card is available.
・D-SD02/010EN Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria

*If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive the equivalent amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
detailed_description:
This content includes the deck recipe and the cards of D-TD02.

[INCLUDED CARDS]
4 copies of each card will be available.
・D-TD02/001EN Jewel-embracing Dragon Fang, Drajeweled
・D-TD02/002EN Demonic Stone Dragon, Jewelneel
・D-TD02/003EN Jewel Core Dragon
・D-TD02/004EN Jewelias Dracokid
・D-TD02/005EN Truculence Raider
・D-TD02/007EN Mystic Accordionist
・D-TD02/008EN Avid Heaper
・D-TD02/009EN Direful Doll, Kjerstin
・D-TD02/010EN One Who Calls Upon Raging Thunder, Furgres
・D-TD02/012EN Connected Rampage, Clenn
・D-TD02/013EN Insane Researcher
・D-TD02/014EN Wire-pull Subjugater
・D-TD02/015EN Caper Companion
・D-TD02/016EN Ultrasound Sirie
・D-TD02/017EN Friend of the Netherworld, Ling
・D-SD02/006EN Icicle Ein, Aizer
・D-SD02/009EN Psychic Prima, Miranda

1 copy of each card is available.
・D-SD02/010EN Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria

*If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive the equivalent amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard DD: Additional Deck [D-TD02]: Michiru Hazama -Demonic Jewel Dragon of the Four Flames-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
